abstract: The shareholders’ vote tallies will not force any change at Wal-Mart, but they highlight support for several proposals regarding broader disclosure and changes to the board.
snippet: The shareholders’ vote tallies will not force any change at Wal-Mart, but they highlight support for several proposals regarding broader disclosure and changes to the board.
lead_paragraph: A breakdown of the Wal-Mart shareholders’ vote tallies showed sustained opposition among some outside shareholders to the company’s chief executive, Michael T. Duke, and highlighted support for several proposals regarding broader disclosure and changes to the board.

headline.main: Discontent With Chief Is Seen in Votes by Wal-Mart Shareholders
headline.print_headline: Discontent With Chief Is Seen in Votes by Wal-Mart Shareholders
